memberdef.name: SMEAR_EVENT
memberdef.initializer: void NAME(HEPUtils::Event& result) \ { \ using namespace Pipes::NAME; \ smearEvent(result, *Dep::HardScatteringEvent, *(*Dep::CAT(EXPERIMENT,DetectorSim)),\ *Dep::RunMC, *Loop::iteration, #EXPERIMENT); \ }

briefdescription.para: Smear an event using a simulation of EXPERIMENT.

detaileddescription.para: ColliderBit event loop functions returning events after detector simulation.
